data.code_commit_message:
feat(mac): Phase 5: MAC peripheral fixes

- Fix accumulator stale-value bug: use process variables for immediate evaluation
- Fix CONFIG_MAC_IN feedback loop: read from CONFIG_MAC_OUT for read-only bits
- Fix signed overflow detection: use variable-based sign comparison
- Remove obsolete ACC_DATA_OUT and LAST_DATA_SIG signals

All 12 CPU tests pass (MAC has no dedicated test coverage yet).
